data.name: SKULL CHAINZ
data.detailed_description:
Smash your way out of Hell in SKULL CHAINZ, an arcade roguelite physics-based combat game!

Beheaded for unspeakable crimes, you are now a mere skull… but when chained with another, you become an unstoppable force of violence!

Simple to learn but hard to master, swing your flail into your enemies to burst them into chunks of gore and bone - Just don’t get hit!

Gameplay Features:

  • Unique skull swinging combat system - throw your skull, or charge it to release an electrocutive blast
  • A rogue’s gallery of demons who will test your limits
  • Upgrades to assist you against the legions of Hell
  • Easy in-game GIF recording - Put your massacre on display
  • A darksynth melody to murder to, orchestrated by Vav

data.short_description: Smash your way out of Hell in this unique physics-based combat game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
